welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sigatoka, a charming town known for its beautiful beaches, warm hospitality, and rich culture. Take a moment to relax and immerse yourself in the laid-back island lifestyle. We invite you to explore and discover all that Sigatoka has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nadi International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Nadi International Airport serves flights within Fiji.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vatulele Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Vatulele Airport provides exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
